sub_title: Co-Founder at Analogia | Four32 - Immersive Audio Studio
summary:
We are a boutique immersive audio agency. We create sound design and music for brands, ad agencies, production companies and technology companies. We also develop music strategies for brands, provide music supervision and create innovative activations. 

We always try to incorporate the latest audio technologies in our projects in order to create the most original and immersive content. Spatial audio, psychoacoustics and multidimensional speaker setups can all find their way into the projects we work on. In our studio we have the possibility to record, mix and master audio in surround and higher order ambisonics, test immersive installations and create spatial audio concepts using the studio’s highly customisable 12.1 surround setup.

When working with us, we offer you the benefits of an ultra fast responsive core team with low overhead, combined with the experience and network of a big music agency. It is our mission to always be on the cutting edge to create unique audio visual immersive experiences.

https://analogiamusic.com/intro/
https://vmt.world/

projects.title: Diesel - Make Love Not Walls | Anomaly
projects.description:
For the worldwide David LaChapelle-directed Diesel campaign, the fashion label’s agency of record, Anomaly, tapped our creative team to supervise the process of finding and rejiggering a track perfectly suited for it.

Launching on the day of love, Valentine’s day, the spot Make Love, Not Walls revolves around a bold, politically-tinged—and particularly timely—message of making love instead of war, building bridges instead of walls, and, accordingly, required an inspired, uplifting track penned and performed by an artist who epitomizes these values himself. After an arduous exploration, the track selected was Danish singer-songwriter Alex Vargas’ hit, “Higher Love,” which was remixed to snugly fit the contours and rhythms of this iconic film.

Some campaigns are ore difficult than others when it comes to getting the right music. But on this campaign we could work on a strategic level with Anomaly to get an artist that endorses the message of the brand. Alex Vargas and Diesel are advocating equal rights and celebrating love. As a strategic music agency we are always aiming for music to be a part of the campaign strategy. A big shout out to Alex Vargas, Locomotion and Brewhouse.

Agency:
Anomaly Amsterdam
Client:
Diesel
Global CMO:
Riccardo Bellini
Director:
David LaChapelle

David LaChapelle

CXA/Maaven

projects.title: Johnnie Walker - Ode to Lesvos | Anomaly
projects.description:
We did the music production and audio post production for the short feature film and all the cut downs. 

Johnnie Walker has created a short documentary about the people of Lesvos in Greece who have been nominated for a Nobel Prize in recognition of the aid and support they give to refugees.

The four and a half minute film includes interviews with some of the islanders who have helped during the crisis. Although poor themselves, they do what they can by supplying food, washing clothes and caring about the refugees' lives and fates.

The film highlights the work of the Mercy Corps, the charity that has been working with the Lesvos community. Donations can be made to the group at www.mercycorps.org/johnniewalker.

Johnny Walker Storyline collaborates with writers, directors, filmmakers and photographers to produce work that "gives real people a voice to tell their stories of progress".

projects.title: Periscopista | Down the Rabbit Hole / Mojo
projects.description:
THE INTERACTIVE MIST INSTALLATION: PERISCOPISTA. AN ENTICING PSYCHEDELIC TRIP MACHINE. WINNER OF THE DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE GRAND PRIX 2016.

Thijs Biersteker and Amp.Amsterdam created the magical interactive installation Periscopista, a giant, misty cloud above the lake that could be controlled by the festival crowd through video feeds, sound, and movement. Resulting in an overwhelming psychedelic cloud that connected the people with their festival surrounding in new and innovative ways.

projects.title: Diadora - Bright Delivery | SMFB, Mediamonks
projects.description:
70 runners from 10 different countries participated in a very unique delivery. Together they brought a pair of sneakers from the hills of Italy, along the coast of France, all the way to the front door of a surprised customer in Barcelona. Check out Diadora's spectacular cross country estafette in this gripping and breathtaking video.

We did music Production for the film within 72 hours, from briefing to live online and TV.

They created the original composition for the spot, which was directed by Santo and produced by Hogarth Worldwide.

projects.title: Samsung - Youth Olympic Games | 72 and Sunny
projects.description:
The film highlights the pressure and doubt that young athletes face as teenagers, which the partnership aims to help them overcome. Young athletes are shown facing the challenges, extreme pressure and even injuries that come with their lifestyle. The film goes on to show how support received from friends and fans can empower these young people achieve their dreams.

projects.title: Fight Cancer Interactive Punching Bag | CPC Press Group, Mediamonks
projects.description:
FIGHT CANCER: INTERACTIVE PUNCHING BAG

The Interactive Punching Bag is an inventive installation created for Dutch NGO, Fight Cancer. The punching bag features a fully functional punchable screen that lets you see how cancer cells develop. Custom-made by MediaMonks from over 4,000 responsive LEDs, the digital punching bag allows you to donate by the punch to raise funds for cancer research. Punch in your personal details and go head-to-head against animated cancer cells in a literal fight against cancer.

projects.title: Amstel - All you need is one beer | Being There, Wefilm
projects.description:
TRAVELING THE WORLD FOR ONE UNFORGETTABLE BEER

This first online film for the new Amstel campaign captures a authentic moment of Onvergetelijk bier (unforgettable beer). Simon sets of to surprise his brother Valentijn who moved to Lapland to work with huskies in the snow. His travel effort resulted in a unique moment of true brotherly love. This documentary, shot with a minimal crew, resulted in an online film and a TV commercial that will be aired in the commercial break of All you need is love on Christmas Eve.

CREDITS
Client: Amstel
Agency: Being There
Creatives: Lionell Schuring, Pieter Scheltema
Director: Niels van Koevorden
Music Production: Amp.Amsterdam
STATS
Views: 308,676

contributors.headline: Co-Founder at Analogia | Four32 - Immersive Audio Studio

projects.title: Vodafone - The loved ones | Khanna Reidinga, Wefilm
projects.description:
We did both licensing and re-recording of 'Lonely this christmas' for this TVC.

To promote Vodafone’s free-unlimited-data-during Christmas-offer we decided to focus on all the people who couldn’t actually be together on Christmas day - and show how Vodafone’s offer can empower them with the next best thing to actually being together.

Featuring the holy trinity of babies, tears, and Elvis, we created Vodafone Netherland’s most watched film of all time in the process.

CREDITS:
Client: Vodafone
Agency: Khanna\Reidinga
Creatives: Rikki Khanna, Joeri Holsheimer
Director: Joeri Holsheimer
STATS
Views: 564,113

contributors.headline: Co-Founder at Analogia | Four32 - Immersive Audio Studio

profile_positions.description:
We are a boutique immersive audio agency. We create sound design and music for brands, ad agencies, production companies and technology companies. We also develop music strategies for brands, provide music supervision and create innovative activations.

We always try to incorporate the latest audio technologies in our projects in order to create the most original and immersive content. Spatial audio, psychoacoustics and multidimensional speaker setups can all find their way into the projects we work on. In our studio we have the possibility to record, mix and master audio in surround and higher order ambisonics, test immersive installations and create spatial audio concepts using the studio’s highly customisable 12.1 surround setup.

When working with us, we offer you the benefits of an ultra fast responsive core team with low overhead, combined with the experience and network of a big music agency. It is our mission to always be on the cutting edge to create unique audio visual immersive experiences.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: In everything I do I strive to create an aesthetic experience which enhances the expression of the project and communicate in such a way that it touches a more profound level inside the listener. I believe in the bigger potential of every brand, person, group of people and mankind as a whole and I strive to help express more of this in everything I do.
profile_positions.title: Music Composer // Sonic Branding & Design Expert // Brain-Sound Researcher

profile_positions.description: Qualia+ is founded by sound designer & researcher Daniel Schotsborg and 'creator cat' Santiago de Graaff. With this website we are offering you a place where you can find all the inspiration you need for your personal legend. Everybody has a purpose, a reason to be on this planet and we want to help you on your journey. We do this by combining the knowledge of the ancients and the technology of today to create a place that helps unlock your greater potential.
profile_positions.title: Co-Owner & Specialized Audio Producer
